2 weeks ago - Mojang Studios (formerly known as Mojang Specifications and Mojang AB), or simply Mojang is a Swedish video game developer based in Stockholm, founded in 2009. It is the creator of the successful indie cult PC game Minecraft, which won many awards and has sold over 350M+ copies as of 2025.
